Data.text_description:
The probability of job satisfaction being high (A=1) is 0.4535. 
For those with job satisfaction being low (A=0), the probability of wheather condition being high (B=1) is 0.5728. 
For those with job satisfaction being high (A=1), the probability of wheather condition being high (B=1) is 0.3338. 
For those with job satisfaction being low (A=0), the probability of temperature being high (C=1) is 0.2173. 
For those with job satisfaction being high (A=1), the probability of temperature being high (C=1) is 0.5065. 
For those with job satisfaction being low (A=0), the probability of air pressure being high (D=1) is 0.9858. 
For those with job satisfaction being high (A=1), the probability of air pressure being high (D=1) is 0.9965.
